titles: A briefe conference of diuers lawes diuided into certaine regiments. By Lodowick LLoyd Esquier, one of her Maiesties serieants at armes.
author: Lloyd, Lodowick, fl. 1573-1610.
notes: With three final contents leaves; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Religion and law --  Early works to 1800.
